sentences.en: After a week, original and hale strong lamina gradually atrophic and shrivelled.
sentences.cn: 一星期后, 本来健壮有力的叶片逐渐萎缩干瘪.

sentences.en: Although he is over eighty, he looks hale and healthy.
sentences.cn: 尽管他已经八十多岁了, 看上去还很健壮.

sentences.en: Hale quite broke up and the translation stopped.
sentences.cn: 黑尔张口结舌,连翻译也停了.

sentences.en: Hale received a salary of forty - five dollars a week.
sentences.cn: 海尔先生每星期45元薪水.

sentences.en: Hale, who had learned the approved view as an undergraduate, contradicted him.
sentences.cn: 赫尔在大学时代学过当时公认的看法, 因此提出驳斥.

sentences.en: Harvey: Hello, Lian. It's Harvey Judd from Hale and Hearty here.
sentences.cn: 哈维: 你好, 丽安. 我是“哈尔及哈迪食品公司”的哈维贾.

sentences.en: He is eighty, but still hale and hearty.
sentences.cn: 他年已八旬, 但仍老当益壮.

sentences.en: He was turning sixty, his hair and beard all white. But he looked hale and hearty.
sentences.cn: 这老汉大约有六十多岁, 胡须头发全都白了, 但是精神却很好.

sentences.en: I overheard him make that remark to the stranger in the dark -- it was in Hale Alley.
sentences.cn: 他在暗处对外乡人说那句话的时候,我在旁边听见了 -- 那是在赫尔胡同.

sentences.en: Lucinda Whipple's ancestors had stormed , particularly her great - grandfather Abner Hale.
sentences.cn: 露辛达的祖先, 特别是她的外曾祖艾布纳·黑尔曾这样表示深恶痛绝.

sentences.en: Nathan Hale took a last look at his beautiful country.
sentences.cn: 内森·黑尔最后看一看他美丽的祖国.

sentences.en: She’s still hale and hearty at 74.
That afternoon, Abner Hale married Jerush Bremley.
sentences.cn: 当天下午艾布纳·黑尔和耶鲁雅·布朗利结为伉俪.

sentences.en: The hale and hearty man is counted among the old.
sentences.cn: 那个硬朗矍铄的人就给归入老人的行列了.

sentences.en: The old man is still hale and hearty.

words.tran_cn: 矍铄的（尤指老人）；强壮的

phrases.tran_cn: 精神充沛的，矍铄的；老当益壮的，健壮的

trans.tran_cn: （尤指老人）精神矍铄的，老当益壮的
trans.tran_en: someone, especially an old person, who is hale and hearty is very healthy and active
